verses.verse: וַיַּעַל֩ <WH5927> went up אַבְרָ֨ם <WH87> And Abram מִמִּצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt ה֠וּא <WH1931> he וְאִשְׁתּ֧וֹ <WH802> he and his wife וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֛וֹ וְל֥וֹט <WH3876> and all that he had and Lot עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with הַנֶּֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> with him into the south
וְאַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> And Abram כָּבֵ֣ד <WH3513> rich מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [was] very בַּמִּקְנֶ֕ה <WH4735> in cattle בַּכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> in silver וּבַזָּהָֽב׃ <WH2091> and in gold

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH1980> went לְמַסָּעָ֔יו <WH4550> on his journeys מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> from the south וְעַד־ <WH5704> far בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> even to Bethel עַד־ <WH5704> far הַמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הָ֨יָה <WH1961> had been שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> in it [אָהֳלֹה כ] (אָֽהֳלֹו֙ <WH168> tent ק) בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <WH8462> at the beginning בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> between Bethel וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הָעָֽי׃ <WH5857> and Hai

אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹם֙ <WH4725> Unto the place הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> of the altar אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> which he had made שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <WH7223> there at the first וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> called שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> and there אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> and there Abram בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> on the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also לְל֔וֹט <WH3876> And Lot הַהֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> also which went אֶת־ <WH854> with אַבְרָ֑ם <WH87> Abram הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> had צֹאן־ <WH6629> had flocks וּבָקָ֖ר <WH1241> and herds וְאֹהָלִֽים׃ <WH168> and tents

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not נָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> was not able to bear אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> And the land לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> them that they might dwell יַחְדָּ֑ו <WH3162> together כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become רְכוּשָׁם֙ <WH7399> for their substance רָ֔ב <WH7227> was great וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> were not יָֽכְל֖וּ <WH3201> so that they could לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> not dwell יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> and there was רִ֗יב <WH7379> And there was a strife בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between רֹעֵ֣י <WH7473> shipherd מִקְנֵֽה־ <WH4735> cattle אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> of Abram's וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> between רֹעֵ֣י <WH7473> shipherd מִקְנֵה־ <WH4735> cattle ל֑וֹט <WH3876> of Lot's וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> and the Canaanite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֔י <WH6522> and the Perizzite אָ֖ז <WH227> then יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> dwelled בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> then in the land

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָ֜ם <WH87> And Abram אֶל־ <WH413> to ל֗וֹט <WH3876> unto Lot אַל־ <WH408> no נָ֨א <WH4994> Please תְהִ֤י <WH1961> Let there be מְרִיבָה֙ <WH4808> strife בֵּינִ֣י <WH996> between וּבֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH996> between וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between רֹעַ֖י <WH7473> shipherd וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between רֹעֶ֑יךָ <WH7473> shipherd כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> we אַחִ֖ים <WH251> [be] brethren אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> ourselves

הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> is not כָל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> [Is] not the whole land לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before הִפָּ֥רֶד <WH6504> separate נָ֖א <WH4994> Please מֵעָלָ֑י <WH5921> and אִם־ <WH518> if הַשְּׂמֹ֣אל <WH8040> I pray thee from me if [thou wilt take] the left hand וְאֵימִ֔נָה <WH3231> then I will go to the right וְאִם־ <WH518> if הַיָּמִ֖ין <WH3225> or if [thou depart] to the right hand וְאַשְׂמְאִֽילָה׃ <WH8041> then I will go to the left

וַיִּשָּׂא־ <WH5375> lifted up ל֣וֹט <WH3876> And Lot אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינָ֗יו <WH5869> his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <WH7200> and beheld אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כִּכַּ֣ר <WH3603> all the plain הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> of Jordan כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כֻלָּ֖הּ <WH3605> everywhere מַשְׁקֶ֑ה <WH4945> that it [was] well watered לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> every where before שַׁחֵ֣ת <WH7843> destroyed יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> סְדֹם֙ <WH5467> Sodom וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲמֹרָ֔ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah כְּגַן־ <WH1588> [even] as the garden יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD כְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> like the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בֹּאֲכָ֖ה <WH935> as thou comest צֹֽעַר׃ <WH6820> unto Zoar

וַיִּבְחַר־ <WH977> chose ל֣וֹ ל֗וֹט <WH3876> Then Lot אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all כִּכַּ֣ר <WH3603> him all the plain הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> of Jordan וַיִּסַּ֥ע <WH5265> journeyed ל֖וֹט <WH3876> and Lot מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> east וַיִּפָּ֣רְד֔וּ <WH6504> and they separated themselves אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> the one מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and אָחִֽיו׃ <WH251> from the other

אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> Abram יָשַׁ֣ב <WH3427> dwelled בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וְל֗וֹט <WH3876> and Lot יָשַׁב֙ <WH3427> dwelled בְּעָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities הַכִּכָּ֔ר <WH3603> of the plain וַיֶּאֱהַ֖ל <WH167> and pitched [his] tent עַד־ <WH5704> toward סְדֹֽם׃ <WH5467> Sodom
וְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> now the men סְדֹ֔ם <WH5467> of Sodom רָעִ֖ים <WH7451> [were] wicked וְחַטָּאִ֑ים <WH2400> and sinners לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> before the LORD מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> exceedingly

וַֽיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> And the LORD אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> unto Abram אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הִפָּֽרֶד־ <WH6504> was separated ל֣וֹט <WH3876> that Lot מֵֽעִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with שָׂ֣א <WH5375> from him Lift up נָ֤א <WH4994> Now עֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> now thine eyes וּרְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> and look מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> from the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> in it צָפֹ֥נָה <WH6828> where thou art northward וָנֶ֖גְבָּה <WH5045> and southward וָקֵ֥דְמָה <WH6924> and eastward וָיָֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> and westward

כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> for all הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> For all the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> you רֹאֶ֖ה <WH7200> which thou seest לְךָ֣ אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <WH5414> to thee will I give it וּֽלְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> and to thy seed עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <WH7760> And I will make אֶֽת־ <WH853> זַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> thy seed כַּעֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> as the dust הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> so that אִם־ <WH518> if יוּכַ֣ל <WH3201> can אִ֗ישׁ <WH582> another לִמְנוֹת֙ <WH4487> number אֶת־ <WH853> עֲפַ֣ר <WH6083> the dust הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth גַּֽם־ <WH1571> also זַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> [then] shall thy seed יִמָּנֶֽה׃ <WH4487> also be numbered

ק֚וּם <WH6965> Arise הִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <WH1980> walk בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> through the land לְאָרְכָּ֖הּ <WH753> in the length וּלְרָחְבָּ֑הּ <WH7341> of it and in the breadth כִּ֥י <WH3588> for לְךָ֖ אֶתְּנֶֽנָּה׃ <WH5414> of it for I will give

וַיֶּאֱהַ֣ל <WH167> removed [his] tent אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> Then Abram וַיָּבֹ֛א <WH935> and came וַיֵּ֛שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt בְּאֵלֹנֵ֥י <WH436> in the plain מַמְרֵ֖א <WH4471> of Mamre אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּחֶבְר֑וֹן <WH2275> which [is] in Hebron וַיִּֽבֶן־ <WH1129> and built שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> and there מִזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> there an altar לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ
